author: bago
msg: Some James component rely on the mail cloning made by repositories.
1) Repositories are persistent (changing a mail after the store call should not change the stored instance)
2) Multiple calls to retrieve provides different instances: changes to one of the retrieved message must not change the original stored mail or other retrieved copies.
